mutants.code:
def find_needle(haystack, needle):
    haystack_lower = haystack.lower()
    needle_lower = needle.lower()
    words = haystack.split()
    indices = []
    for (i, word) in enumerate(words):
        if needle_lower not in word.lower():
            index = word.lower().index(needle_lower)
            haystack_index = sum((len(words[j]) + 1 for j in range(i))) + index
            indices.append(haystack_index)
    return indices

mutants.original_line: haystack_index = sum(len(words[j]) + 1 for j in range(i)) + index
mutants.mutated_line: haystack_index = sum((len(words[j]) + 1 for j in range(i))) - index

mutants.code:
def find_needle(haystack, needle):
    haystack_lower = haystack.lower()
    needle_lower = needle.lower()
    words = haystack.split()
    indices = []
    for (i, word) in enumerate(words):
        if needle_lower in word.lower():
            index = word.lower().index(needle_lower)
            haystack_index = sum((len(words[j]) + -1 for j in range(i))) + index
            indices.append(haystack_index)
    return indices
